cards.description:
Card 1 description

content.title: Thar Desert Safari  45678
content.description: Experience the thrill of a Thar Desert safari in Jaisalmer. Traverse the rugged terrain in 4x4 vehicles, camp under the starry sky, and enjoy traditional Rajasthani hospitality amidst the dunes.
content.content: Thar Desert Safari 1

cards.title: Card 4 title
cards.description:
Card 4 description
The warning is indicating that in your file Cards.tsx, you're importing a named export (cards) from a module that only exports a default export. Currently, JavaScript allows both named exports and a default export from a single module.

content.title: Desert Adventure -45678
content.description: Embark on a thrilling desert adventure in Jaisalmer. Explore the golden sand dunes, ride camels, and witness mesmerizing sunsets over the vast desert landscape.
content.content: Desert Adventure

content.title: Historic Forts
content.description: Discover the rich history of Jaisalmer through its magnificent forts. Visit the iconic Jaisalmer Fort, also known as Sonar Quila, and explore its intricate architecture and fascinating stories.

content.title: Cultural Experience
content.description: Immerse yourself in the vibrant culture of Jaisalmer. Witness traditional Rajasthani dance performances, indulge in local cuisine, and shop for exquisite handicrafts in the bustling markets.
content.content: Cultural Experience

content.title: Thar Desert Safari
content.description: Experience the thrill of a Thar Desert safari in Jaisalmer. Traverse the rugged terrain in 4x4 vehicles, camp under the starry sky, and enjoy traditional Rajasthani hospitality amidst the dunes.
content.content: Thar Desert Safari

testimonials.quote: It was the best of times, it was the worst of times, it was the age of wisdom, it was the age of foolishness, it was the epoch of belief, it was the epoch of incredulity, it was the season of Light, it was the season of Darkness, it was the spring of hope, it was the winter of despair.
testimonials.name: Charles Dickens
testimonials.title: A Tale of Two Cities

testimonials.quote: To be, or not to be, that is the question: Whether 'tis nobler in the mind to suffer The slings and arrows of outrageous fortune, Or to take Arms against a Sea of troubles, And by opposing end them: to die, to sleep.
testimonials.name: William Shakespeare
testimonials.title: Hamlet

testimonials.quote: All that we see or seem is but a dream within a dream.
testimonials.name: Edgar Allan Poe
testimonials.title: A Dream Within a Dream

testimonials.quote: It is a truth universally acknowledged, that a single man in possession of a good fortune, must be in want of a wife.
testimonials.name: Jane Austen
testimonials.title: Pride and Prejudice

testimonials.quote: Call me Ishmael. Some years ago—never mind how long precisely—having little or no money in my purse, and nothing particular to interest me on shore, I thought I would sail about a little and see the watery part of the world.
testimonials.name: Herman Melville
testimonials.title: Moby-Dick
